name: Pune-Cultural capital of Maharashtra
description:
Call it Pensioner's Paradise, Oxford of the East or Cultural Capital
          of Maharashtra, Pune or Punyanagari (the pious city ) enjoys all the
          above mentioned titles. But the new breed of professionals and college
          goers from all over the country, seem to have taken the responsibility
          of giving it a new name - Cybercity or Shopper's Paradise. Sitting
          gracefully on the cotton-rich Deccan Plateau, Pune is the second
          important city in the state after Mumbai. Rich with the heritage of
          old bungalows endured with flower gardens and decaying wadas, the city
          blend itself well with the modernization and is going global with
          malls, multiplexes, pubs and the Semi-Metro tag.
